analysis.description:
ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#7-14) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#10-11)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#167-178) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#170-174)

Bounty0xEscrow.approveToPullOutTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_token).approve(_receiver,_amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeTokenToAddressesAndAmounts has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(_hunters[i].send(_amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#229)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeTokenToAddressesAndAmounts has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20(_token).transfer(_hunters[k],_amounts[k]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#234)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeTokenToAddressesAndAmountsWithoutHost has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(_hunters[i].send(_amounts[i])) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#248-249)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeTokenToAddressesAndAmountsWithoutHost has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20(_token).transfer(_hunters[k],_amounts[k]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#254-255)

Bounty0xEscrow.distributeWithTransferFrom has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20(_token).transferFrom(_ownerOfTokens,_hunters[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#268-269)

Reentrancy in Bounty0xEscrow.depositToken (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#191-200):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(_token).transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#195-198)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xc849a5fff9befa297d1c3a772bafac9f3c9004ec.sol#198-199)
